title: Lida93
author: Lida93
content: Our people say if snake don bite you befor if you see long black rope you go run without person tellin you to. And for this tori INEC na be the snake while Nigerians na be the befor beaten victim by the snake.Source: https://twitter.com/MobilePunch/status/1707321146410938423?t=_z7bXaJHPXads3wyAWxhqA&s=19As Kogi, Imo and Bayelsa states elections draw closer INEC don dey lament say voters no even send to com out colet their Parmernent Voter's Cards (PVC's). And the headline com sound laughable wen I first read am but then at same time com send strong message say we Nigerians no longer get faith and trust for INEC. Meaning say, INEC no get beta reputation to stand on base on how dem use their own hand assist rig the just concluded 2023 general elections for we country.No body wan waste their energy, time on sumtin wey dem know say las las e go end as selection process by INEC wit support from the bastardized court processes and judgement. ( He popular slogan: if u don't lik it go to court).Many many people for social media don dey even say as INEC don destroy their credibility wit their own hands PVC, BVAS, IREV all don turn useless bcos INEC go still announce results in favor for who dem want as winner.How una see dis matter. Is it possible say INEC fit redeem the trust people bin get for dem thru dis Kogi, Imo and Bayelsa states elections by doing the right thing as what ought to be?  Or say na just same road dem go still take as dem do for the general elections? Abeg share ur thoughts with me!

comments.author: Odohu
comments.body: This one no come to me as surprise at all... democracy don die for Nigeria after that sham them do for 2023. This one na even small; you know how many wey don burn their voters card? The political apathy don start already. By 2027, they will be beating people coming to campaign self because na waste of time and energy. Make INEC kuku dey write results give who them want we no send them. NA MUMU DEY VOTE!

comments.author: Ever-young
comments.body: Eh just they start, but if voters like make dem go take their voters card or make dem leave am, eh no go stop them from conducting the election, eh go appear say Nigerian don lose hope for where INEC they base on the result of the election way them carry mouth conclude and to add to the fact say INEC and their officials no do Watin dem suppose do. But if them no go take their voters card who them they do? The government look like who even send them, this one nah another opportunity to use as excuse for anything way them wan do for front for the upcoming election make we no forget say this our government they sabi use opportunities well for their own interest. Me I go say make who get voters card way him never take and him from that side make in go their go take am, make them vote their choice when the time reach for election, nah who no try fuck up, make eh be say them don do their part go vote if eh Favour them better if the officials also wan do wayo eh concern them, but if you no go out go vote how you wan carry know say nah who you been carry for mind really win.

comments.author: Smartgoat
comments.body: black will always remean black no matter what you do. Nigeria way of conducting election is bad and corrupt no matter what we do about it. I'm not surprise, that such things will happen to this state's. but the worst is yet to come. by 2027 , is then they will know Nigerians. in this states'elections, we are not expecting anything less than rigging. because nothing will change.

comments.author: Hewlet
comments.body: INEC had the opportunity to win back the trust of Nigerians during the last presidential election but choose to throw our trust on the ground. I f anyone still decides to vote during any election in this country that involves these cabals, the person really tried.We are in a very pitiable situation where although we want to vote for our choice of candidate, we are almost certain that the powers at the top will still make the final say and our votes might not really count.

The citizens hope were thrown to the mud by INEC without them having to lokk back the consequences of their actions. After raising the hopes of many Nigerians for a credible and free fair election dem com boldly slap us on the face by helping the politicians rig de general elections nah make people no fit get mind com out to pick their PVC cos dem go just tink say nah journey in futility cos who Dem  go vote no go even count on that day.  I beliv say e go take a new INEC chairman and administration to take convince Nigerians says dem fit do well again cos right now no hope and trust on dem

Na people wey dey sell there vote be mumu and na them I go blame but even if I go reason the matter again I no go blame who dey sell vote because even if you sell your vote or not, your vote no count because of corruption

comments.body: Quote from: Hewlet on September 30, 2023, 04:16:32 PMINEC had the opportunity to win back the trust of Nigerians during the last presidential election but choose to throw our trust on the ground. I f anyone still decides to vote during any election in this country that involves these cabals, the person really tried.Me I think say na judiciary spoil everything. That court judgement wey even uphold INEC plea say them fit throwaway bivas and irav uploading of results real time, na them I blame. The court confirm say them don already select the person wey be next so the only thing to do na to enter street but them sabi say naija youth no go like risk their lives. Electronic voting and transmission of result wey INEC themselves introduce wey law back am up, them still no use am especially for presidential because dem no say the person wey them want for government no win.For the voters card collection, people dey even burn theirs . Why will you risk your life go vote wey be say at the end of the day , where election no hold dem go bring result wey favour their person.The Jennifer Seifegha woman wey thugs carry bottle stab for eyes still dey voters mind and people no go want stand against who dem don select to win. Make dem just do wetin dem want as deir wish.

comments.author: Lorokan
comments.body: Quote from: Lida93 on September 30, 2023, 08:09:24 AM How una see dis matter. Is it possible say INEC fit redeem the trust people bin get for dem thru dis Kogi, Imo and Bayelsa states elections by doing the right thing as what ought to be?  Or say na just same road dem go still take as dem do for the general elections? Abeg share ur thoughts with me!It is up to Kogi, Imo and Bayelsa states resident to do the needful, which is walk up to INEC registration offices and pick up their permanent voters card; it is also duties of friends, relatives and far relatives to encourage natives to walk up and pick up their voters card. Your vote is your power, we must ensure to educate the masses about the consequences of voter apathy, and with irev and bvas in use, rigging is reduced; if 80% of the masses can get their voters card and vote the "rigging" will be a thing of the past in Nigeria elections.Remember, once you fail to pick up your voters card, or vote; you are contributing to the ills of the Nigerian state!

You fit tell me of any time the electorates were so much educated about the importance of elections and why they should get involved compared to how the level of voters education was in the 2023 general elections, were private individuals provided their own resources to mk sure we get tins right on the election day but still nothing changed. So what's the power in there?3. If collecting of voters card nah go stop rigging for Nigeria nah for this 2023 election nah e for happen bcos this year nah people collect PVC pass in all other elections in the history of Nigeria but yet politicians with the hep of INEC and the court make people look foolish. So how u wan tk stop rigging now for sometin  u no fit stop for general elections?

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: I see the caption and was tempted to pass because just looking at am dey make my temperature rise. Them still get liver dey complain say no voters to collect PVC after wetin them don do? In short, them sopoz cancel the election and appoint new leaders as nah so then dey do before because no matter the numbers of people wey cast votes, as long as them go do mago mago nah who them chose go come out winner. This electioneering wahala don tire me. I feel say them dey bothered because if them no get voters, there is no way them fit falsify records.Even if them sack all the members for INEC appoint new ones, all go still dey corrupt so winning back the trust of the masses go hard. See how people dey suffer because of bad governance all for say who them elect dey more concerned about lining their pocket than developing the area e dey govern.
